data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'eInvoice Serial Number Status'
define view entity zetr_ddl_i_producer_numstat
  as select from zetr_t_edocnum as Numbers
  association        to parent zetr_ddl_i_producer_serials as _producerSerials     on  $projection.CompanyCode  = _producerSerials.CompanyCode
                                                                                   and $projection.SerialPrefix = _producerSerials.SerialPrefix
  association [1..1] to zetr_ddl_i_producer_parameters      as _eProducerParameters on  $projection.CompanyCode = _eProducerParameters.CompanyCode
{
  key Numbers.bukrs as CompanyCode,
  key Numbers.nrobj as NumberRangeObject,
  key Numbers.serpr as SerialPrefix,
  key Numbers.numrn as NumberRangeNumber,
  key Numbers.gjahr as FiscalYear,
      Numbers.numst as NumberStatus,
      _eProducerParameters,
      _producerSerials
}
where
  Numbers.nrobj = 'ZETR_EPR'

],
